articles.description: "For an international athlete aiming to win a medal in the Olympic Games, you need proper equipment and training facilities," Nadeem, who recently underwent surgery for an elbow problem, added.
articles.content: Neeraj Chopra’s rival on the field and close friend off it, Pakistan’s javelin thrower Arshad Nadeem on Thursday said that he hasn’t been able to acquire a new international standard javelin for many… [+1886 chars]
